definitions.definition: a flat shape with three straight sides:
anything that has three straight sides:
examples: Which earrings did you buy in the end - the triangles or the circles?

definitions.definition: a musical instrument consisting of a thin metal bar bent into a triangle shape that is hit with a metal bar to make a sound
a flat piece of metal or plastic in the shape of a triangle with one angle of 90°, used for drawing angles
a three-sided frame for arranging the balls at the start of a game of billiards, pool, etc.
